title: Luxury Sea View Apartment near Galle Face
details:
Newly built luxury sea view apartment for sale, located near Galle Face in Colombo 3. Walking distance to major hotels, restaurants and other recreation areas. The propoerty has received the Certificate of Conformity (COC) and the Condominium Management Authority (CMA) certificate and deed transfers can be done within a few weeks.
Best or nearest offer will be accepted for immediate sale.
